title: Provides for the financing and construction of capital facilities for a certain not-for-profit corporation
summary: Provides for the financing and construction of capital facilities for a certain not-for-profit corporation.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3488

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 25, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. WRIGHT -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Corporations, Authorities and Commissions

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing for
         the  financing  and  construction  of capital facilities for a certain
         not-for-profit corporation

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  (b)  of  subdivision  2 of section 1676 of the
    2  public authorities law is amended by adding a new undesignated paragraph
    3  to read as follows:
    4    YOUNG ADULT INSTITUTE, INC., FOR THE ACQUISITION, FINANCING, REFINANC-
    5  ING, CONSTRUCTION, RECONSTRUCTION, RENOVATION, DEVELOPMENT, IMPROVEMENT,
    6  EXPANSION AND EQUIPPING OF CERTAIN  EDUCATIONAL,  COUNSELING,  TRAINING,
    7  MEDICAL,  DENTAL  ADMINISTRATIVE, DAY PROGRAM AND RESIDENTIAL FACILITIES
    8  TO BE LOCATED IN THE STATE OF NEW YORK.
    9    S 2. Subdivision 1 of section 1680 of the public  authorities  law  is
   10  amended by adding a new undesignated paragraph to read as follows:
   11    YOUNG ADULT INSTITUTE, INC., FOR THE ACQUISITION, FINANCING, REFINANC-
   12  ING, CONSTRUCTION, RECONSTRUCTION, RENOVATION, DEVELOPMENT, IMPROVEMENT,
   13  EXPANSION  AND  EQUIPPING  OF CERTAIN EDUCATIONAL, COUNSELING, TRAINING,
   14  MEDICAL, DENTAL ADMINISTRATIVE, DAY PROGRAM AND  RESIDENTIAL  FACILITIES
   15  TO  BE  LOCATED  IN  THE  STATE  OF  NEW YORK. NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER
   16  PROVISION OF LAW, THE YOUNG ADULT INSTITUTE, INC. SHALL HAVE FULL  POWER
   17  AND  AUTHORITY  TO ASSIGN AND PLEDGE TO THE DORMITORY AUTHORITY, ANY AND
   18  ALL PUBLIC FUNDS TO BE APPORTIONED OR  OTHERWISE  MADE  PAYABLE  BY  THE
   19  UNITED  STATES,  ANY  AGENCY  THEREOF,  THE STATE, ANY AGENCY THEREOF, A
   20  POLITICAL SUBDIVISION, AS DEFINED IN SECTION ONE HUNDRED OF THE  GENERAL
   21  MUNICIPAL  LAW,  ANY  SOCIAL SERVICES DISTRICT IN THE STATE OR ANY OTHER
   22  GOVERNMENTAL ENTITY  IN  AN  AMOUNT  SUFFICIENT  TO  MAKE  ALL  PAYMENTS
   23  REQUIRED TO BE MADE BY SUCH INSTITUTE PURSUANT TO ANY LEASE, SUBLEASE OR
   24  OTHER  AGREEMENT  ENTERED  INTO BETWEEN SUCH INSTITUTE AND THE DORMITORY

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06902-01-1

       A. 3488                             2

    1  AUTHORITY. ALL STATE  AND  LOCAL  OFFICERS  ARE  HEREBY  AUTHORIZED  AND
    2  REQUIRED  TO PAY ALL SUCH FUNDS SO ASSIGNED AND PLEDGED TO THE DORMITORY
    3  AUTHORITY OR, UPON THE DIRECTION OF  THE  DORMITORY  AUTHORITY,  TO  ANY
    4  TRUSTEE  OF  ANY  DORMITORY AUTHORITY BOND OR NOTE ISSUED, PURSUANT TO A
    5  CERTIFICATE FILED WITH ANY SUCH STATE OR LOCAL OFFICER BY THE  DORMITORY
    6  AUTHORITY PURSUANT TO THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION.
    7    S 3. Any contracts entered into by the dormitory authority pursuant to
    8  this act shall be deemed state contracts within the meaning of that term
    9  as  set  forth  in  article 15-A of the executive law, and the authority
   10  shall be deemed, for the purposes of this act, a contracting  agency  as
   11  that term is used in such article.
   12    S 4. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing for the financing and construction of capital facilities for a certain not-for-profit corporation
